result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Bradley Dean Blanchard

records.addlTxt:
10:01 AM Bradley Dean Blanchard in Court,  Atty Dan Firkus,  ADA Joseph M. Schieffer for the State of Wisconsin. Includes 21CF274, 22CM17 and 22CM95 (STC). Atty Firkus states they are close to a resolution and would like to set a PH which will probably be a waiver. ADA Schieffer will bring in the Officer if needed, Atty Firkus to let him know. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 10:09 am.
Status conference scheduled for November 28, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Status conference on November 28, 2022 at 09:00 am.

3:22 PM Defendant Bradley Dean Blanchard appeared in custody from Jail via video, Atty Liesl Nelson appears by phone, ADA Joseph M. Schieffer appeared in court for the State of Wisconsin. Includes 21CF274, 22CM17 (RW)  Court questions non-appearance,  has been in custody since June. Court will quash the warrants and reinstate the bonds in 21CF274 and 22CM117. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 3:31 pm.
Status conference scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Status conference on October 25, 2022 at 10:00 am.
DE in custody - E: DA, Atty & Email: Jail & Dispatch. eif

records.addlTxt: MISSED court appearance is incorrect. should be 5/9 and not 2/28/2022. Not printed or sent to PCJ.

2:34 PM Bradley D. Blanchard does not appear in Court, Attorney Daniel James Chapman, ADA Joseph M. Schieffer appears for the State of Wisconsin. Includes 22CM95 (IA), 21CF274 (PH) and 22CM17. Atty Chapman has no idication of his whereabouts. ADA Schieffer is requesting a warrant. Court will authorize Adj. States.
Status conference on May 9, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

ADDRESS INFO for Bradley Dean Blanchard
Current: 497 5th Avenue N., Apt #2, Bayport, MN 55003 United States  (Effective: 04-04-2022)
Prior: 390 Staples Rd, Osceola, WI 54020

3:02 PM Defendant Bradley Dean Blanchard appears in custody from Jail via video, Atty Liesl Nelson appears by phone, DA Halle E. Hatch appears for the State of Wisconsin.  22CM17 and 21CF274. Court questions non-appearance, Def responds. Bond continues in 21CF274. Court will quash the warrants.  Court informs Defendant of charges, and possible penalties and rights. Defendant understands. Waives reading. Court reviews DE's rights. NG. DA Hatch is requesting a $1,000.00 SIBS on 22CM17, no objection. Court so orders. Court confirms address and phone number. Court adjourned at 3:10 pm.  Status conference scheduled for May 9, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
